channel.title: Monster of the Week-1890 Cthulhu London - Gauntlet Open Gaming Weekend
channel.description:
**[Monster of the Week set in 1890 London involving deities, creatures, lore and items from Cthulhu Mythos stories]**
• Start with 3 Luck. • No Professional or Spell Slinger playbooks. • Each character has Alternative magic type from More Weirdness/Tome of Mysteries. • Victorian England.
- The game will be recorded on youtube via Streamyard. - X-Card will be available.
1-1 slot - https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MPTjXeVFt2o59Qu66ZN 2-2 slots - https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MPTjlY2ZxUofhTaSGdg
